iata:declaredNoCarriageValueIndicatorNVD.description: When no value is declared the field should be completed with No Value Declared (NVD)

iata:declaredValueCarriageAmount.description: The value of a shipment declared for carriage purposes (element values limited to range 0.001999999999999).

iata:declaredNoCustomsValueIndicatorNCV.description: When no value is declared, the field may be completed with No Customs Value (NCV) or left blank

iata:declaredValueCustomsAmount.description: The value of a shipment for Customs purposes (element values limited to range 0.001999999999999.

iata:declaredNoInsuranceValueIndicatorXX.description: When no value is declared the field should be completed with No Value (XXX)

iata:declaredPrepaidCollectWeightValuati.description: Code indicating whether Weight Valuation payment will be made at origin (prepaid) or at destination (collect)

iata:declaredPrepaidCollectOtherCharges.description: Code indicating whether Other Charges payment will be made at origin (prepaid) or at destination (collect)
